demos.message:
🚀 Great to meet you, John! Next question:

**What is your professional role and capacity?** 🚀
demos.milestone_array: [{'name': 'Intro', 'description': 'Ask the user the following quick and easy intro questions.', 'steps': ['1. Name/Alias', '2. Professional role + capacity', '3. Industry', '4. Org size S/M/L w/ eg.']}, {'name': 'Questionnaire', 'description': 'Ask the user the following questions to assess the business AIMM.', 'steps': ['1. Is AI (LLM or ML) a strategic business initiative? Is it budgeted?', '2. Are you using AIaaS (LLM)? eg. Open AI, Google Gemini, Antropic… any others?', '3. If yes: AIaSS use. Eg. Employees access chatgpt, leverage API?', '4. Do you train your own AI models? where do you host them?', '5. If yes: Are you using them in production or just experimenting?', '6. Prompt chains/multihop, versioning, dependencies, tools', '7. Data quality level, does it hinder AI effectiveness. Tools/strategies leveraged?', '8. Security/governance framework/posture? Does security make solution delivery challenging?', '9. Org AI training/enablement program.', '10. Monitoring usage, cost, performance AI initiatives monitoring', '11. Open end additional AI usage information.']}, {'name': 'LeadGen', 'description': 'Capture business leads', 'steps': ['1. Tell User your human counterparts are building solution in the AI space and would love feedback.', '2. Ask for business name and email']}, {'name': 'Assess and Reco', 'description': 'Provide your AIMM assessment and recommendedations.', 'steps': ['1. Award each Dimension a Stage number from 1 to 5.', '2. Include your rationale for the Stage awarded.', '3. Always end your Assessment with an Assessment Object.', '4. Identify areas for improvement.', '5. Suggest specific actions to address each area.', '6. Provide resources or references for further learning.']}, {'name': 'Engagement Consent', 'description': 'Secure follow up engagement with the user.', 'steps': ['1. Ask if the user wants to deep dive with your human counterparts: Alex and Myk.', "2. Confirm the user's email."]}]
